xwikidoc.content:
{{include reference="Demarches.Dashboard.Code.DashboardMacros"/}} {{velocity}} #set($displayDocTitle = false) #set($displayTitleContentSeparator = false) #set ($dashboard = $doc.getObject($DASHBOARD_CLASS_ID)) ## The Demarche sheet SSX and JSX are needed for editing a démarche in a modal dialog #set ($discard = $xwiki.ssx.use($DEMARCHE_SHEET)) #set ($discard = $xwiki.ssx.use($DASHBOARD_SHEET)) #set ($discard = $xwiki.ssx.use('Demarches.Code.MontserratWebfontSSX')) ## Dashboard header ## (% class='row observatoire-explanation' %)((( (% class='container' %)((( (% class='document-header'%) ((( (% class='document-info'%) ((( (% id='document-title' %)((( = $services.localization.render("dashboard.title") = ))) ))) ))) ))) #if ($hasAdmin) (%class='dashboard-container'%)((( {{html clean='false'}}
  • Tableau
  • Détails
{{/html}} ))) #end ))) ## ## (%class='tab-content'%)((( (%id="view-dashboard" class="tab-pane fade #if($xcontext.action=='view')in active#end"%)((( (%class='row download-share'%)((( (% class='dashboard-container' %)((( (%class='col-xs-12 col-md-6 downloadcol'%) ((( #set ($pdf = $dashboard.getValue('pdf')) #if ("$!pdf" != '') #set ($pdfFile = $doc.getAttachment($pdf)) #set ($size = $pdfFile.getLongSize()) #set ($size = $mathtool.div($size, 1000)) #set ($size = $mathtool.round($size)) (% class="download" %) [[$services.icon.render('download') $services.localization.render('dashboard.download-pdf', $size)>>path:$doc.getAttachmentURL($pdfFile.filename)]] #end ))) (%class='col-xs-12 col-md-6 sharecol'%) ((( #set ($socialNetworks = [{ "icon": "fa-twitter", "url": "https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=" }, { "icon": "fa-linkedin", "url": "https://www.linkedin.com/shareArticle?mini=true&url=" }, { "icon": "fa-facebook", "url": "https://www.facebook.com/sharer.php?u=" }, { "icon": "fa-envelope", "url": "mailto:?subject=Observatoire de la dématérialisation&body=" }]) {{html clean="false"}} #set ($url = $escapetool.xml($doc.getExternalURL())) $services.localization.render('dashboard.share.label') : #foreach ($socialNetwork in $socialNetworks) #if ($velocityCount != 1)/#end #end {{/html}} ))) ))) ))) (%class='row table-tools'%)((( (% class='dashboard-container' %)((( (%class='col-xs-12 col-md-6 dashboard-filters'%)((( ))) (%class='col-xs-12 col-md-6 dashboard-selector'%)((( {{html clean="false"}}
#getPublishedDashboards()
    #foreach ($entry in $publishedDashboards) #set ($page = $xwiki.getDocument($entry))
  • $page.title
    • #end
#if ($hasAdmin || $isAdministrateurMinisteriel) $services.localization.render('dashboard.live.name') #end
{{/html}} ))) ))) ))) (%class='row table-rows'%)((( (% class='dashboard-container' %)((( #if ($xcontext.action == 'view') ## Dashboard table ## #set ($discard = $xwiki.jsx.use($DEMARCHE_SHEET)) #set ($discard = $xwiki.jsx.use($DASHBOARD_SHEET, {'minify': false, 'timestamp': $datetool.systemTime, 'pageId': $doc.fullName})) {{html clean="false" wiki="false"}}
$services.localization.render('dashboard.table.demarche') $services.localization.render('dashboard.table.ministry') $services.localization.render('dashboard.table.group') $services.localization.render('dashboard.table.digitalization') $services.localization.render('dashboard.table.satisfaction') $services.localization.render('dashboard.table.mobile') $services.localization.render('dashboard.table.support') $services.localization.render('dashboard.table.performance') $services.localization.render('dashboard.table.france-connect') $services.localization.render('dashboard.table.tell-us-once')
{{/html}} #end ))) ))) ))) ## ## Dashboard metadata view / edit ## #if ($hasAdmin) (%id="view-details" class="tab-pane fade #if($xcontext.action=='edit') in active #end"%)((( (% class='row xform' %)((( (% class='container' %)((( #set ($class = $xwiki.getClass($DASHBOARD_CLASS_ID)) #foreach($property in $class.properties) |=(% style="width: 20%" %)$doc.displayPrettyName($property.name, $dashboard)|((( $dashboard.display($property.name, $xcontext.action) #if ($xcontext.action == 'edit')(% class="xHint" %)$services.localization.render("${DASHBOARD_CLASS_ID}_${property.name}_hint")(% %)#end ))) #end #if ($xcontext.action == 'view') |=Pièce jointe|((( #if ($doc.getAttachment('data.json') != $NULL) [[attach:data.json]] #else Aucune pièce jointe #end ))) #end #if ($doc.getObject($DASHBOARD_CLASS_ID) != $NULL && $xcontext.action == 'view') {{info}} $services.localization.render('dashboard.generation.hint') {{html wiki="false" clean="false"}}
{{/html}} {{/info}} #end #if ("$!request.action" == 'json' && $services.csrf.isTokenValid($request.token)) #computeDashboardData(0) #if ("$!request.live" == 1) #writeJson() #else #attachJson() #end #end ))) ))) ))) #end ))) {{/velocity}}
